name: AcuteMyocardialInfarctionSNOMEDCodesForAEReporting
title: Acute Myocardial Infarction, SNOMED codes for AE reporting
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Acute myocardial infarction definition of SNOMED diagnosis codes, for potential identification of potential biologics-related adverse events.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element in the QDM category of Condition/Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Acute myocardial infarction of types I-V),(Exclusion Criteria: Non-acute/sequelae of myocardial infarction are excluded.)
